Genel Belirtiler (Vücut): I have an elevated body temperature.
I feel the urge to vomit.
I am expelling stomach contents through my mouth.
I experience a sensation of lightheadedness or unsteadiness.
I have lost a significant amount of body weight.
I feel extreme tiredness and lack of energy.
I have a deficiency of red blood cells, leading to fatigue.
I experience shivering or feeling cold.
My veins appear swollen or protruded.
I feel discomfort or pain throughout my body.
Baş/Boyun: I have pain in my head.
I experience pain in my neck.
I feel a headache concentrated on one side of my head.
I am disoriented or have difficulty understanding things.
My vision is unclear or fuzzy.
I see images in an altered or abnormal way.
I am more sensitive to light and sound than usual.
My neck feels stiff and limited in movement.
Gözler: My eyes are producing excessive tears.
The whites of my eyes appear red.
I am experiencing pain or discomfort in my eyes.
The whites of my eyes have a yellowish tint.
My vision is unclear or fuzzy.
I am more sensitive to light than usual.
Sindirim Sistemi: I feel a burning sensation in my chest or throat.
I experience pain in the upper abdomen or chest.
I have trouble moving food from my mouth to my stomach.
I feel like there is something stuck in my throat.
I have pain or discomfort in my abdomen.
I am experiencing frequent, watery bowel movements.
I am expelling stomach contents through my mouth.
I feel the urge to vomit.
I have a feeling of fullness and tightness in the abdomen.
I am expelling gas from the stomach through the mouth.
I have a reduced desire to eat.
I am experiencing discomfort or pain in the upper abdomen.
Deri: Cilt rengindeki değişiklikler
There are alterations in the color of my skin.
Kırmızı/kaşıntılı yaralar
I have red and itchy sores on my skin.
Sarı veya bal renginde kabuklanmalar
Scabs on my skin have a yellow or honey-colored appearance.
Sıcak, kızarık ten
My skin feels warm and appears red.
Pullu Deri
My skin is dry and covered with scales.
Döküntü
I have an outbreak of red, raised, and often itchy skin.
Kabuklar
I have dried blood or pus over a healing wound.
Sıvı dolu kabarcıklar
Blisters on my skin contain clear fluid.
Kaşıntı
I experience a sensation that prompts me to scratch my skin.
Kuru Cilt
My skin lacks moisture and feels rough or flaky.
Şişme
There is an abnormal enlargement of body parts or areas.
İdrar Yolu: İdrar yaparken ağr
I feel pain or discomfort while urinating.
İdrar yaparken yanma hissi
I experience a burning or stinging feeling during urination.
Sık idrara çıkma
I need to urinate more often than usual.
Bulanık İdrar
My urine appears cloudy or murky.
İdrarda kan
There is blood visible in my urine.
Mesaneyi kontrol etmede zorluk
I have trouble controlling my bladder, leading to leakage.
Bağırsakları kontrol etmede zorluk
I have trouble controlling my bowels, leading to leakage.
Koyu idrar
My urine has a darker color than usual.
Soluk veya kil renginde dışkı
My stools have a pale or clay-like color.
İdrar aciliyeti
I feel a strong and sudden need to urinate.
Kas ve İskelet Sistemi: I have pain or discomfort in the joints.
There is a limitation in the normal range of motion.
I feel a lack of strength or energy.
My muscles are shrinking or losing mass.
I experience cramping in my legs during the night.
There is an abnormal enlargement of joints.
I feel difficulty in moving certain body parts.
I experience involuntary contractions of muscles.
Solunum Sistemi (Akciğerler): Hapşırma
I forcefully expel air through my nose.
Burun tıkanıklığı
My nasal passages are blocked or congested.
Öksürme
I am expelling air from the lungs with a sudden sharp sound.
Burun akması
My nose is producing excess mucus.
Boğaz ağrısı
I have pain or irritation in the throat.
Hırıltı
I produce a whistling sound while breathing.
Öksürük atakları
I experience sudden and severe bouts of coughing.
Nefes darlığı
I find it difficult to breathe and feel breathless.
Göğüste sıkışma
I feel a squeezing or pressure in my chest.
Hızlı nefes alma
I am breathing at a faster rate than normal.
